title: Clive Cussler collection. 58 organised books
description:
Complete and up to date as of December 2013 with the exception of Built for Adventure: The Classic Automobiles of Clive Cussler and Dirk Pitt which unfortunately I can't find.
 
The torrent is zipped because they're all organised into folders numbered in each series' correct reading order, sorry.

All in .mobi format except The Mayan Secrets which is .epub.

CHILDREN'S BOOKS
================
01 - The Adventures of Vin Fiz - Clive Cussler & William Farnsworth
02 - The Adventures of Hotsy Totsy - Clive Cussler
